Posts.Content: I had the same treatment today for the first time and the cold cap. I have felt fine today but will see how I get on. I wish you luck but it wasn't as bad as i thought except I have rubbish veins and the cap hurt like hell x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I had the same treatment as you yesterday with the cold cap. Felt a bit sick and tired today but not to bad. Hope you got on ok today x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I had the same treatment and thought the same until yesterday day 7 when everything has kicked in. Had diarrhoea all yesterday along with sore mouth and heart burn which felt like my whole digestive system has been burnt. To top it off I had in inject myself with white blood cells which I have been doing since Friday but last night they had me in agony. Moan over still in pain. Hope you keep well x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Thanks ruby rose . Trying to drink plenty but not good at it. I've got mouthwash so it's not to bad. Things are up and down but getting there slowly. Every day is different .x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Diamondmum have been taking gavason tablets and Imodium . I did phone to check first. Hope you are still feeling ok x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi I as diagnosed end of March and told I would be having op and radiotherapy op being Friday13 th May lol have to laugh. But was always told if I was her2 positive I would need chemo but only 15% were so tried not to think about it. Even went to pre-op on the monday and still waiting on her2 results. On the Wednesday got called in to speak to doctors and told I was her2 positive so would need chemo first. I'm also hormone postive and grade 3. I just think of it as a detour as long as the result is ok in the end it don't matter how you get there. I'm having second chemo today and still feel ok most of the time. I'm 35 with 3 children 14 10 and 20 months. Hope this helps x
Posts.Title: Refusing chemotherapy after Her2+ results
